Some colours for the corporate style of vlaanderen.be. Taken from level 1, and level 2 palette 7

Source: R/package_and_data.R
vlaanderen_colours.Rd

Colour according to the Flanders style guide as hexadecimal values.

  • vl_yellow

  • vl_darkyellow

  • vl_black

  • vl_grey1

  • vl_grey2

  • vl_grey3

  • vl_grey4

  • vl_grey5

  • vl_grey6

  • vl_grey7

  • vl_lightgreen

  • vl_darkgreen

  • vl_lightblue

  • vl_darkblue

  • vl_lightred

  • vl_darkred

  • vl_lightbrown

  • vl_darkbrown
